description: Navigate to https://wrangler.in and validate homepage load and readiness, reporting any popups.
plan:
1. Navigate to the Wrangler website at https://wrangler.in.
2. Validate that the homepage loads successfully and is ready for interaction.
3. Locate and click on the Search icon to activate the search bar.
4. Validate that the search bar is visible and ready for input.
5. Enter the text 'Rainbow sweater' into the search bar.
6. Validate that the search results are updated based on the entered text.
7. Locate the Neck filter section and select the 'Turtle Neck' filter.
8. Validate that the filter is applied and the results are updated accordingly.
9. Assert that only one product is displayed as the result, regardless of the product type.
10. Final assertion: Confirm that the displayed product(s) match the search and filter criteria.
next_step: Navigate to the URL https://wrangler.in using a browser session. MANDATORY: Before proceeding, review and validate the outcome of any previous step. Upon page load, scan for and report any advertisement popups, promotional banners, or marketing modals in the Dialog_Detection and Dialog_Details fields—do not dismiss unless explicitly authorized. Verify that the homepage loads successfully and is ready for interaction (e.g., main navigation and search icon are visible). Provide explicit Task_Completion_Validation before terminating.

execution_result.output: The Wrangler India homepage loaded successfully. The main navigation bar is visible at the top with menu items such as "EOSS," "NEW IN," "MEN," "WOMEN," "COLLECTIONS," "SALE," "FIT GUIDE," and "BLOGS." The search icon and other user/account/cart icons are also present and visible. There is a prominent promotional banner ("END OF SEASON SALE - BUY 1 GET 1 FREE*") integrated into the page layout, but it is not a popup or modal dialog. A notification bar at the top offers free shipping, easy returns, and a discount code. No modal dialogs, popups, or blocking marketing overlays were detected—only standard integrated banners and notifications.
execution_result.details: Both visual and DOM analysis confirm the homepage is fully loaded, interactive, and free of blocking dialogs or popups.
execution_result.validation: All task requirements have been met. The homepage loaded successfully, the main navigation and search icon are visible and ready for interaction, and a thorough scan confirmed the absence of any blocking popups or modals. The site is ready for further actions.
